info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bronx County through 345 PM EDT... At 300 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Riverdale, or over East Tremont. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... East Tremont, Throgs Neck Bridge, Riverdale, Co- op City, City Island, Mount Vernon, Pelham, Woodlawn, Pelham Manor and Fordham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
